sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react";
import { Form, Grid, Input, Button } from "semantic-ui-react";
import Layout from "./layout";

class change extends Component {
  state = { name: "", rollno: 0, branch: "" };

  render() {
    return (
      <Layout>
        <Grid>
          <Grid.Row>
            <Form onSubmit={this.changeName}>
              <Form.Field inline>
                <label>Name</label>
                <Input
                  value={this.state.name}
                  onChange={event =>
                    this.setState({ name: event.target.value })
                  }
                />
                <Button style={{ marginLeft: "10px" }}>Submit</Button>
              </Form.Field>
            </Form>
          </Grid.Row>
          <Grid.Row>
            <Form onSubmit={this.changerollno}>
              <Form.Field inline>
                <label>rollno</label>
                <Input
                  value={this.state.rollno}
                  onChange={event =>
                    this.setState({ rollno: event.target.value })
                  }
                />
                <Button style={{ marginLeft: "10px" }}>Submit</Button>
              </Form.Field>
            </Form>
          </Grid.Row>
          <Grid.Row>
            <Form onSubmit={this.changebranch}>
              <Form.Field inline>
                <label>branch</label>
                <Input
                  value={this.state.branch}
                  onChange={event =>
                    this.setState({ branch: event.target.value })
                  }
                />
                <Button style={{ marginLeft: "10px" }}>Submit</Button>
              </Form.Field>
            </Form>
          </Grid.Row>
          <Grid.Row>
            <Form onSubmit={this.changedob}>
              <Form.Field inline>
                <label>Date of Birth</label>
                <Input
                  value={this.state.dob}
                  onChange={event => this.setState({ dob: event.target.value })}
                />
                <Button style={{ marginLeft: "10px" }}>Submit</Button>
              </Form.Field>
            </Form>
          </Grid.Row>

          <Form onSubmit={this.changebloodGp}>
            <Form.Field inline>
              <label>bloodGp</label>
              <Input
                value={this.state.bloodGp}
                onChange={event =>
                  this.setState({ bloodGp: event.target.value })
                }
              />
              <Button style={{ marginLeft: "10px" }}>Submit</Button>
            </Form.Field>
          </Form>
        </Grid>
      </Layout>
    );
  }
}

export default change;
